text:
League 1
Dijon-PSG: Which teams for Jobard and Tuchel?
Paris Saint-Germain are on the pitch in Dijon this Friday night, on the occasion of the 12th day of Ligue 1. Which teams will be aligned by the two coaches, St√©phane Jobard and Thomas Tuchel?
01 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Florian Sermaise



The big gap. This Friday night, on the occasion of the 12th day of Ligue 1, the Parisian leader moves on the lawn of the lantern Dijon. In the standings, eighteen points already separate the two teams, who did not live the same week. Beaten in Brest a week ago in the league (0-2), the Burgundians were on track for the knockout stage of the League Cup Tuesday night in Bordeaux. And the adventure has already ended for the men of St√©phane Jobard, defeated 2-0 by the Girondins. For their part, the champions of France have finally been able to rest after their demonstration of Sunday evening in the Classic against Olympique de Marseille (4-0). As a "European" team, as well as Lille, Lyon, Rennes and Saint-Etienne, the Parisians have indeed been exempted from this round of cups. The players of Thomas Tuchel should be at the rendezvous tonight Gaston-Gerard. Which teams will be aligned for this clash of extremes?




Probable teams




St√©phane Jobard, Dijon coach + 15 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Check out the teams likely to be in line this evening, for this match of the 12th day of Ligue 1:

Dijon: Gomis - Mendyl, Ecuele Manga, Coulibaly, Chafik - Pereira, Lautoa, Ndong, Amalfitano - Tavares (c), Mavididi
PSG: Navas - Kurzawa, Kimpembe, Diallo, Dagba - Paredes, Marquinhos (c), Gueye - Di Maria, Cavani, Mbapp√©
